34 
43 #include "spacenav.hpp"
44 #include "std_msgs/Bool.h"
45 #include "std_msgs/Float64.h"
46 
47 using namespace std;
48 
49 namespace Tapi
50 {
51 // Constructor/Destructor
52 
53 Spacenav::Spacenav(ros::NodeHandle* nh) : nh(nh)
54 {
55  // Create all Tapi-compliant publishers
56  apiPub = new Tapi::Publisher(nh, "Spacenav Wrapper");
57  spacenavPub[0] = apiPub->AddFeature<std_msgs::Float64>("Linear X", 1);
58  spacenavPub[1] = apiPub->AddFeature<std_msgs::Float64>("Linear Y", 1);
59  spacenavPub[2] = apiPub->AddFeature<std_msgs::Float64>("Linear Z", 1);
60  spacenavPub[3] = apiPub->AddFeature<std_msgs::Float64>("Angular X", 1);
61  spacenavPub[4] = apiPub->AddFeature<std_msgs::Float64>("Angular Y", 1);
62  spacenavPub[5] = apiPub->AddFeature<std_msgs::Float64>("Angular Z", 1);
63  spacenavPub[6] = apiPub->AddFeature<std_msgs::Bool>("Button 1", 1);
64  spacenavPub[7] = apiPub->AddFeature<std_msgs::Bool>("Button 2", 1);
65  spacenavPub[8] = apiPub->AddFeature<sensor_msgs::Joy>("[Optional] Full Joy Message", 1);
66 
67  // Subscribe to the spacenav_node
68  spacenavSub = nh->subscribe("spacenav/joy", 1, &Spacenav::forwardData, this);
69 }
70 
71 Spacenav::~Spacenav()
72 {
73  spacenavSub.shutdown();
74  delete apiPub;
75 }
76 
77 // Private member functions
78 
79 void Spacenav::forwardData(const sensor_msgs::Joy::ConstPtr& received)
80 {
81  // Get data from spacenav_node and republish it as full Joy message
82  spacenavPub[8]->publish(received);
83 
84  // Now also republish the data as single topics
85  for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
86  {
87  std_msgs::Float64 forward;
88  forward.data = received->axes[i];
89  spacenavPub[i]->publish(forward);
90  }
91  std_msgs::Bool forward;
92  forward.data = received->buttons[0];
93  spacenavPub[6]->publish(forward);
94  forward.data = received->buttons[1];
95  spacenavPub[7]->publish(forward);
96 }
97 }

ros::Subscriber spacenavSub
Subscriber to listen on the spacenav_node.

ros::Publisher * spacenavPub[9]

Tapi::Publisher * apiPub
